title: How to buy Raspberry Pi Zero in bulk - Quora

response.answer_text: At the moment I don’t think you can - every place that ordinarily stocks it is either out of stock, or is limiting orders to one or two per customer. Hang in there, and the Pi foundation will probably increase their output; their first production run on the Pi version 1.0 sold out incredibly quickly as well.

Price is just not 5$ it's more. Buy it from this websites raspberrypi.org said that.  It's look like Only pimoroni has it and limited to 1 unit per customer. Everybody just like killing each other for 5$
